summary: Two best friends have their relationship tested when Abel tries to help his friend Clement with the latter's love interest Mona.
cast: Golshifteh Farahani|Vincent Macaigne|Louis Garrel|Mahaut Adam|Pierre Maillet|Christelle Deloze|Rhizlaine El Cohen|Yen Tram Le Thi|Hitomi Ryoke|Ulysse Korolitski|Laurent Laffargue|Rachid Hami|Emmanuel Matte|Manon Combes|Pierre Devérines|Maxime Meunier|Benopir Cassière|Aymeline Valade|Basilis Athanassiadis|Luc Poignant|Eric Bartonio|Anthony Bruchet|Pierre-Olivier Mattei|Michelle Goddet|Thibault Lacroix|Francesca Téa Capasso
title: Les deux amis
